author: alec#8068
name: GetEmoji
install_msg:
**Thanks for installing!**
 Keep in mind, at this time, this cog will NOT function unless you are hosting this api: https://github.com/kaogurai/api
 It will default to look for the API at http://localhost:6969/, but you can change this with the `[p]emojiapiurl` command.
short: Get images of emojis from multiple providers.
description: This cog uses a self-hosted API server to scrape emojipedia and return images of certain emojis.
